title.rendered: Macallan Sir Peter Blake: An Estate, A Community and A Distillery

excerpt.rendered:
An Estate, A Community And A Distillery – A special limited edition created to commemorate Sir Peter Blake’s visit to The Macallan Estate on the legendary River Spey, featuring a label digitally designed by Sir Peter himself.

Inspired by The Macallan and Sir Peter Blake’s shared appreciation of beauty, nature and legacy, The Macallan lead whisky maker Sarah Burgess, has created a warm and inviting classic single malt whisky, rich in dried fruits and spices with a hint of orange and clove. The taste hints of cracked black pepper and treacle with accents of vanilla and orange oil. A long, rich oak finish with cinnamon and cacao.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age :
Vintage : 
ABV : 47.70%
